Guarantee.title: Guarantee
Guarantee.description: Information of the guarantee used to ensure compliance with the terms of a contract.

id.title: Guarantee ID
id.description: A local identifier for this guarantee, unique within this block.

guaranteeType.title: Guarantee type
guaranteeType.description: Specify the guarantee type for this contract using the [guaranteeType](https://github.com/INAImexico/ocds_guarantees_extension/blob/master/codelists/guaranteeType.csv) codelist.

date.title: Guarantee date
date.description: The date of the guarantee. This is the date on which the guarantee is issued.

guaranteedObligations.title: Guaranteed obligations
guaranteedObligations.description: Specify the type of obligations that are guaranteed, using the [obligationType](https://github.com/INAImexico/ocds_guarantees_extension/blob/master/codelists/guaranteedObligations.csv) codelist.

guaranteePeriod.title: Guarantee period
guaranteePeriod.description: The period on which this quote is valid.

guarantees.title: Guarantees
guarantees.description: A list of the guarantees given for this contract.
